product_info.title: Create your Password Manager
product_info.prod_img1: Save here all your passwords, data or any information, forget paper notes and protected applications.
product_info.prod_img2: Create your master password: only you can access your secrets with it.

prod_info1.title: How does it work
prod_info1.content: First, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password so remember it well.

prod_info2.title: What data can you save?
prod_info2.content: For example, the number of your card, the PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information you need to have in a safe place

product_info.terms_check: You confirm that you are of legal age and that you accept that we treat your data according to the data protection policy

product_form.title: Crea tu Password Manager
product_form.info1: First, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password so remember it well.
product_form.info2: Also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
product_form.hint: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)

password.matches: Must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase, and one digit

error.title: An error has occured
error.content: We have not been able to modify your Master Password. Try again later.

success.title: Your Password Manager has been created successfully
success.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Quibusdam molestiae fugit ipsam.
